attributes.additional_details:
Parliamentary privilege should be abolished so that MPs/Lords are not protected from legal action for what they say in Parliament. MPs & Lords must be accountable.

Currently there is an existing law being the offence of misconduct in public office but we do not see MPs/Lords being prosecuted under this. The removal of Parliamentary Privilege could help and see the police and public prosecutors get involved.
attributes.background: Parliamentary Privilege grants certain legal immunities for MPs/Lords who are granted protection against civil or criminal liability for certain actions undertaken as part of their parliamentary duties. We are calling for the removal of Parliamentary Privilege to ensure MPs/Lords are accountable.
